price: Por certo, os piores seres animais, perante Allah, são os que renegam a Fé, pois não crêem.
arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi alladhīna kafarū fahum lā yu'minūna
